name: PHASESwitchNodeDefinition
desc: A node that passes invocation to only one of its child nodes.

items.name: init(switchMetaParameterDefinition: PHASEStringMetaParameterDefinition)
items.desc: Creates a node that invokes a child node based on the value of the given parameter.

items.name: init(switchMetaParameterDefinition: PHASEStringMetaParameterDefinition, identifier: String)
items.desc: Creates a named node that invokes a child node based on the value of the given parameter.

items.name: var switchMetaParameterDefinition: PHASEStringMetaParameterDefinition
items.desc: The meta parameter that holds the name of the child node to invoke.

items.name: func addSubtree(PHASESoundEventNodeDefinition, switchValue: String)
items.desc: Adds a child node with the given switch value.
